abstract: Riversdale Mining of Australia says it has been talking with Rio Tinto about a potential sale of the company, which produces coal in Africa.
snippet: Riversdale Mining of Australia says it has been talking with Rio Tinto about a potential sale of the company, which produces coal in Africa.
lead_paragraph: Just days after Walter Energy and Western Coal announced their merger, another coal deal is in the offing.

headline.main: Riversdale Talking With Rio on $3.4 Billion Deal
